c:capability.name: MotorizedDoor
c:capability.c:description: Model of a motorized door, like a Garage Door with an opener.

c:attribute.name: doorstate
c:attribute.description: Current door state, and if written, desired door state.

c:attribute.name: doorlevel
c:attribute.description: % open. 0 is closed, 100 is open. Some doors do support reporting what level they are currently at, and some support a requested door level to leave a garage door at partial open.

c:attribute.name: doorstatechanged
c:attribute.description: UTC date time of last doorstate change
